title: The Power of Fascination: Techniques and Applications
first_phrase: This text explores various aspects of fascination, hypnosis, and meditation, and their different applications. The first part of the text delves into the concept of inner fascination within Boen tradition of Tibet, while the second part focuses on the fascination with the use of a light source, self-fascination with mirrors, and fascination to enchant and raise Kundalini energy. The latter part discusses techniques such as quantum fascination for therapy, hypnosis, trance, and meditation, and their different uses, including hypnotism for clairvoyance and dance therapy. Additionally, the text presents various strategies, techniques, and mechanisms used in hypnosis and trance, including anchoring and post-hypnotic suggestion. Finally, the text explores other alternative therapies such as EFT and EMDR. This part of the text will focus on two other techniques of interest, namely targeted meditation and subtle hypnosis of hypnomentalsim, with a brief overview of spiritism.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the study of NLP and hypnosis offers a plethora of techniques and methodologies to improve the quality of life of individuals. From understanding linguistic models to the use of fascination for inducing hypnotic states, these tools can be utilized to heal and empower oneself towards a more fulfilling existence.
